body_html: One thing to look out for is making sure the shapes of the predictions and labels being fed into the accuracy metric are the same. There could be some broadcasting at times that can lead to odd values for the accuracy number. Use tf.shape. tf.Print to print out for a few steps and see whats going on.

body: One thing to look out for is making sure the shapes of the predictions and labels being fed into the accuracy metric are the same. There could be some broadcasting at times that can lead to odd values for the accuracy number. Use tf.shape. tf.Print to print out for a few steps and see whats going on.
